abstract.p: Correction of June 20 article on Archbishop Edward M Egan's Mass of Installation at St Patrick's Cathedral in New York

block.p: An article on Tuesday about Archbishop Edward M. Egan's Mass of Installation and an article on Sunday about preparations for the ceremony both misstated the route of an outdoor procession in Manhattan. Before walking to St. Patrick's Cathedral for the Mass on Monday, more than 1,000 priests and bishops assembled at the Palace Hotel, behind the cathedral on Madison Avenue, not at the Catholic Center at 56th Street and First Avenue.
